      • getBytePerSample

        public int getBytePerSample()
        returns the required bytes for the sample bit size. Such that, if 4 or 8 bit samples are used. it returns 1, if 12 bit used 2 returns.
        Returns:
        required byte amount for the sample size in bits.

        Returns:
